name: Marvin & Me
description:
Take care of Marvin

Have you ever wondered what it's like to own a cat? Wonder no more! Adopt Marvin into your soul in this physics-based experience.

Marvin & Me is a short game that was made for Physics Jam 2021

A game made by Kirsten-Lee Naidoo & Rohun Ranjith with additional sounds and music by Dustin van Wyk
